author: Susie Madrak
title: The Great Kentucky Hemp Experiment
text:
sharethis 10/12/15 7:10am The Shell Farms & Greenhouses is an expansive 1,000-acre property in Garrard County, 37 miles south of Lexington, Kentucky. The five-generation family farm is operated by 31-year-old Giles Shell and his 60-year-old father, Gary. The two are whizzes at making ornamental flowers flourish, and like most farmers in the area, the family has grown tobacco forâ€¦ Giles Shell , hemp farm , Shell Farms & Greehouses Comments
